document.full_text: experts say al qaeda's no. 2 leader, ayman al-zawahri, may have a harder time selling his jihadist ideology without the charismatic presence of his predecessor.
document.title: bin laden's likely heir is viewed as organizer, not as inspiring figure
lines_and_colors: experts say al qaeda's no. 2 leader, ayman al-zawahri, may have a harder time selling his jihadist ideology without the charismatic presence of his predecessor.
